Show password There are prestart settings of Schulte tables training should be improved Here is the news list coming soon.\n Brief info: https://handwiki.org/wiki/Schulte_table Notifications should be here This is dashboard fragment Double Dot The Dot Circles Red/Blue Circles R/B Lined Circles R/B Crossed Piramidot Necker\'s cube Necker\'s Cube Doubled Necker\'s Ball Necker\'s Cylinder Dancing Girl Dancing Cat There are very symple thereforee hard exercicises which are require your stable attention Twin mode* For the asterisk-marked exercises content will run as a parallel stereo image Penrose\'s Triangle s.Deviation: Average: Turns missed Schulte+ Basics Dummy Button DUMMY\nCONTENT Khao Manee User related options User About the application About Contact to developer Contact Agree to share non-personal data App shows mistakes Options SUM Your exercise results are NOT SENT to server, thou you also CAN NOT see the other users\' results (ratings off) Your exercise results ARE SENT to server, though you also CAN SEE the other users\' results (ratings ON) ST ON ST OFF Sound Vibration response Help Send feedback Report technical issues or suggest new features Name Name or nickname what\'s visible to other users e-mail Identifier that allows restoring data (not visible to other users) This application dedicated to main idea of human development. It implements well-known trainee tool Tables of dr.Schulte who developed them to study human\'s attention and to help people with mental diseases improve their abilities.\n Besides several variants of Schulte Tables, we put in the app some psychonetics-tested treasures which are necessary to everyone who pursuits: Consciousness, Self-Development and Open-Mind approach to the Universe. Click here -> Our website You can change your level within the reached span "Your current level out of " The level you can choose for rating trainings Stars Level Your maximum reached level is %s Hours Earned number of \'minutes\' converted to hours of practice There are core exercises based upon Schulte methods Primary flow The exercise wants you to collect growing sequence Field width or x-size Field height or y-size Ratings Your settings gets comparable to other members\' settings. Your scores might be written to the Wall of Fame. This settings are for variety of personal training. Your scores are saved into your Achievements table. Air and Fire (7х7)> Two sequences are waiting: Blue grows from 1 and Red wanes from 24 Four Seasons (10х10) For sequences: Up, Down, Convergent, Divergent... That might make you mad for starters Hints These fancy glows, digital reminders and timing are for rookie levels only. Real psychonaut needs nothing more than void. Cell\'s symbol type Mishmash! Well, try to find them all totally unique Shaken, not stirred!
